PropertyList.title: Helicoptere Piasecki H-21 Schawnee

key.name: s
key.desc: Start Engines and Rotor Gear ON
Shutdown Engines and Electric power OFF

PropertyList.text:
That Helicopter is loaded with: Electric power OFF Engines and Rotor Gear OFF Rotor Brake ON Brake-Parking ON (the pilot door is opened)
START and STOP ROUTINE To start: 1 Magneto and Electric Power ON => key "}" 2 Start the engine, rotor brake OFF and rotorgear ON => key "s" 3 Brake-Parking OFF => key "B" (right door will close)
To stop: Electric Power, Engine and Rotorgear OFF => key "{"
